mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no AS boardNo, b.board_type AS boardType, b.title, b.content, b.write_date AS writeDate, b.author, u.user_name AS authorName, b.priority FROM tb_board b JOIN tb_userinfo u ON b.author = u.user_no WHERE b.board_type = #{boardType} AND b.priority != 0 ORDER BY b.priority DESC, b.write_date DESC

AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')

SELECT b.board_no AS boardNo, b.board_type AS boardType, b.title, b.content, b.write_date AS writeDate, b.author, u.user_name AS authorName, b.priority FROM tb_board b JOIN tb_userinfo u ON b.author = u.user_no WHERE b.board_no = #{boardNo}

SELECT b.board_no AS boardNo, b.board_type AS boardType, b.title, b.content, b.write_date AS writeDate, b.author, u.user_name AS authorName, b.priority FROM tb_board b JOIN tb_userinfo u ON b.author = u.user_no WHERE b.board_type = 'N' AND b.priority = 0 AND b.board_no < #{boardNo} ORDER BY b.board_no DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT b.board_no AS boardNo, b.board_type AS boardType, b.title, b.content, b.write_date AS writeDate, b.author, u.user_name AS authorName, b.priority FROM tb_board b JOIN tb_userinfo u ON b.author = u.user_no WHERE b.board_type = 'N' AND b.priority = 0 AND b.board_no > #{boardNo} ORDER BY b.board_no ASC LIMIT 1
